abstracts.cdata!:
The development objectives of the Second
            Multisectoral HIV/AIDS Control Project for Benin are derived
            from the country's strategic plan for fighting HIV/AIDS
            and its effects, and for preventing the further spread of
            HIV/AIDS by means of a multisectoral program approach. The
            changes are as follows: (i) a reallocation of the proceeds
            of the credit; and (ii) an extension the closing date from
            December 31, 2011 to June 30, 2012. There will be no change
            in the project development objective (PDO), project
            components, and institutional arrangements. The expected
            outcome of the restructuring would be a more effective
            project implementation resulting in a better control of the
            HIV/AIDS epidemic through improved prevention of
            transmission by high-risk groups, treatment of those
            infected by the virus, and better management of the national response.
